00130   static void downcaseString_inplace(std::string& str) {
00131     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < str.size(); i++) {
00132       str[i] = tolower(str[i]);
00133     }
00134   }
00138   static std::string downcaseString(const std::string& str_orig) {
00139     std::string str=str_orig;
00140     downcaseString_inplace(str);
00141     return str;
00142   }

00145    struct ltstr {
00147      bool operator()(const char* s1, const char* s2) const {
00148       return strcmp(s1, s2) < 0;
00149      }
00150    };

00152    struct ltstring {
00154      bool operator()(const std::string& s1, const std::string& s2) const {
00155        return strcmp(s1.c_str(), s2.c_str()) < 0;
00156        //return s1.compare(s2)<0; //vliber
00157      }
00158    };

00324   static void trimString(std::string& s, const char *whitespace  = " \r\n\t") {
00325     s = s.erase(s.find_last_not_of(whitespace)+1);
00326     s = s.erase(0,s.find_first_not_of(whitespace));
00327   }

00391   static void subChar(std::string &s, char from, char to) {
00392     std::string::size_type pos = 0;
00393     for(pos = 0; pos < s.size(); pos++) {
00394       if(s[pos] == from) {
00395         s[pos] = to;
00396       }
00397     }
00398   }

00509 private:
00510     class StaticMem {
00511         public:
00512             StaticMem() {
00513                 uint64_t freeRam = 0, totalRam = 0, swapAvail = 0, memAvail = 0;
00514                 Util::memInfo(freeRam, totalRam, swapAvail, memAvail, false);
00515                 m_MemFreeAtStart.push_back(memAvail);
00516             }
00517             uint64_t getMemFreeAtStart() {
00518                 return m_MemFreeAtStart[0];
00519             }
00520             uint64_t getMemFreeAtBlock() {
00521                 return m_MemFreeAtStart[m_MemFreeAtStart.size()-1];
00522             }
00523             void pushMemFreeAtStart(uint64_t mem) {
00524                 m_MemFreeAtStart.push_back(mem);
00525             }
00526             uint64_t popMemFreeAtStart() {
00527                 uint64_t mem = m_MemFreeAtStart[m_MemFreeAtStart.size()-1];
00528                 m_MemFreeAtStart.pop_back();
00529                 return mem;
00530             }
00531 
00532         private:
00533             std::vector<uint64_t> m_MemFreeAtStart;
00534     };
00535 
00536     static StaticMem &getStaticMem();
00537 
00538 
00539 };
